column5: Glad to see that everything is ok there Rich.  I really enjoy some of your stories and pics.....I've laughed quite a few times.....that's for sure.  Jason
Welcome back BBR, sorry about you and sleded!
oops... offended the masses.  sorry
^Yawn...  Oh sorry, that was me falling asleep at your rant, asshat.  Why not follow the "horses" out of the barn then?
lol @ RAFF  too funny.
Good too see your doing well BBR..  guess being famous the quirks of no private life .. LOL  See you on the water Rich..
Glad to see you back on OFC.  Very sorry to hear about you and Sleded breaking up.  Relationships are difficult, finding the one who is right for you may take some time.  But time heals all wounds.
Hi Rich. Glad to see you are still around.  Join in on chat some night and spice things up..
Glad to hear from you Rich. Put me on that list for wanting to take him out for a 3 hour tour  ...........love to share a boat with you some day. Sorry about you and Sleded, but life goes on!
icky girls  Raf yer killing me dude.LOOL
Haven't seen Rich on for quite a while. Did he go to BC? He mentioned on chat one night that he may be going. Anybody know?
I was wondering the same thing, use to see him on all the time, haven't seen a post from him in  a while.
Geez ...Maybe Clampet....Could be he is a singer too...they went on tour
I wondered the very same thing today! Hope he's ok wherever he is.
Donesville?
Yes Roy... He last posted Feb 22nd . Funny he didnt say anything about going to British Columbia on the forum.
maybe writing peoples name in the sand got the best of him?
I just saw him out in fishmasters boat not more than 45 minutes ago.....

Eloped with Nautifish. I have children older than rich thankyou very much.  Rich is doing just fine has been working alot more and has a new love in his life which has also been keeping him busy. Himself and sledded were out on the weekend ice fishing but sleded only caught one Crappie. Ice fishing season for them has not been the greatest this yr which is another reason they have probably not had much reason to post.  They are both madley in love lol.......and these were riches words not mine.  There is more to life than just fishing!   Trust me i allmost fell over when i read that on my forum......lol

so Sleded and him are in love??? doesnt surprise me a bit...   not that there is anything wrong with that...   Rich does have a face only a mother could love or perhaps another man? being gay seems so poser'ish now.. Good luck with it Rich....   When's the wedding.. their still legal here right? and who is wearing the dress? Will it be White?   Gerritt.

so Sleded and him are in love??? doesnt surprise me a bit...  LOL  Well i think everyone allready knows they are in love Gerrit no surprise they're at all  Gerrit i said he had a NEW!!!!! love in his life....Since when was sledded new in his life?......LOL Those two go way way back......lol
I'm really not too sure of how to take this information.  Dont really know Rich too well as I havent been around too long...  But it is funny  I missed his good posts.
So let me get this straight.  He's dating the salmon?
shakes head!*sighs*

To fish with either of these two..BBR or Sleded is and should be an honour to most on this board...lest we forget the Action Angling Tv episodes....man these guys are just plain famous. Anyway I went looking for the infamous BBR and Sleded a few weeks ago in some of their local haunts but didn't find them...Hmmm where could they be....?
I miss Rich,he's a good egg.Wayne,I think he paid his dues for that pic,you may wanna let it rest bud. Joe
Rich who??
Actually rich caught that beauty last yr out on one of fishmasters charters. I also beleive it was in one of the fishing mags but cannot remember which one......
Rich and Eric did an Action Angling episode on that day as well.
I just about feel off my chair LOL ...  but like Joonmoon says they are a laugh to fish with .. Rich & Sleded a little hungry
Yeah I was wondering about him also.  I mean where he was not ....you know???.  Hope all is good.

Thanks, jackass!  Anyways Yeah I havent been fishing lately... working tons and other personal stuff has come up. For instance Sleded broke up with me and started chasing those icky girls.  We'll be out more once the ice melts.
LOL..........as always you are to much Rich...........Nice to here from you again.
My apologies,got thie pic mixed up with another I think..Glad you are back Rich. Joe
